Public Class ContentControl Inherits Control Implements IAddChild
public ref class ContentControl : System::Windows::Controls::Control, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild

summary.span: 表示內含任何類型之單一內容的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control with a single piece of content of any type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以包含任何類型的 common language runtime 物件 (例如字串或物件) 或物件 (例如或)。The can contain any type of common language runtime object (such as a string or a object) or a object (such as a or a ). 這可讓您將豐富的內容控制項，例如和。This enables you to add rich content to controls such as and . 下圖顯示四個按鈕的屬性設定為下列其中之一：The following illustration shows four buttons whose property is set to one of the following: - 字串。A string. - 物件。A object. - 物件。A object. - A包含其他控制項物件。A control that contains other objects. ![四個按鈕](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "四個按鈕")![Four buttons](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "Four buttons") 四個按鈕與不同類型的內容Four buttons with different types of content A有限的預設樣式。A has a limited default style. 如果您想要加強控制項的外觀，您可以建立新。If you want to enhance the appearance of the control, you can create a new . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 若要使用的另一個典型的案例是來顯示有關選取之項目的詳細資訊控制項。Another typical scenario is to use the to show more information about an item selected in an control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 繫結至集合並顯示選取項目基礎資訊](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-a-collection-and-display-information-based-on-selection.md)。For more information, see [How to: Bind to a Collection and Display Information Based on Selection](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-a-collection-and-display-information-based-on-selection.md). 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何建立四個按鈕顯示在 < 備註 > 一節。The following example demonstrates how to create the four buttons shown in the Remarks section. > [!NOTE] > 雖然[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]範例中的版本無法使用``周圍的每個按鈕內容的標記，則不需要。Although the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] version of the example could use the `` tags around the content of each button, it is not necessary. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XAML 概觀 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md)。For more information, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md). [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)] 下列範例示範如何讓樣式使控制項具有增強的視覺外觀。The following example shows how to make a style for a so that the control has an enhanced visual appearance. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是預先定義、 複合的或自訂字串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 如需字串格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如果您設定或屬性、屬性會被忽略。If you set the or property of a , the property is ignored. ## Examples 下列範例會指定的格式物件藉由設定屬性及套用兩個物件，繼承自。The following example specifies the format of objects by setting the property in a and applying the to two objects, which inherit from . summary.span: 取得或設定一個樣板選取器，讓應用程式撰寫者可以提供自訂的樣板選取邏輯。

span.span: Gets or sets a template selector that enables an application writer to provide custom template-selection logic.
A data template selector.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常您會建立有一個以上相同類型的物件，而且您想要提供您自己選擇的邏輯套用根據每個資料物件的屬性。Typically, you create a when you have more than one for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a to apply based on the properties of each data object. 請注意，如果您有不同的物件類型與您可以設定屬性。Note that if you have objects of different types you can set the property on the . 如果您這麼做，則不需要建立。If you do that, then there is no need to create a . 此外，如果您有物件類型相同，但具有不同的屬性時，您也可以考慮使用或資料轉換。Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a or a data converter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 若要建立範本選擇器，請建立繼承自類別並覆寫方法。To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from and override the method. 您的類別定義之後，您可以指派給您的項目範本選取器屬性的類別的執行個體。After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element. 如果兩個和設定的屬性，則會忽略這個屬性。If both the and the properties are set, then this property is ignored. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 指示是否應該保存 屬性。

returns.span: 如果 屬性應該要保存，則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這`ShouldSerialize`方法提供，因為屬性並沒有簡單的預設值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 這個方法會指出屬性是否已變更其預設值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果您開發的設計工具通常呼叫這個方法或開發您自己的控制項加入。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .
